Html:
Hi guys!

First of all, great work you guys did here, thanks a lot for sharing it with all of us!

I've read in a few different places (incl. in this discussions here), that Techcraft supports infinite terrains. However, the demo project is not using this.
Is there a simple was to "enable" the infinite generation or do I need to reverse engineer the engine and implement that functionality?

I've had a look at voxeliq too....which has the Infinite functionality implemented by default, but unfortunately, voxeliq apparently is not updated anymore and has some bad issues with some broken voxels, so I wanted to get back to Techcraft instead! :)

Thanks a lot in advance for your feedback!

Hi DanielJC,

The NewTake project has infinite terrain. Simply set it as the startup project in Visual Studio, and you are good to go!

Hi Jacoo2!

thanks for the fast feedback!
I have tried NewTake (latest version from codePlex) .....but if I walk to the "end" of the terrain, all I get is this "black area" instead of newly generated terrain.
Am I doing something wrong?



Thanks a lot for your help!

Did I do something wrong when using NewTake? Is there maybe a flag to be set, in order for the "infinite" world, continuously to be generated?

Thanks a lot in advance for your feedback!
